name: total-audio-promo
description: Semi-automated music promotion service for independent artists and PR agencies

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:audio-intel" "npm run dev:playlist-pulse" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:audio-intel" "npm run dev:playlist-pulse" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:audio-intel && npm run build:playlist-pulse && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:audio-intel && npm run lint:playlist-pulse && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:audio-intel && npm run test:playlist-pulse && npm run test:backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:audio-intel && npm run typecheck:playlist-pulse && npm run typecheck:backend
scripts.status: echo '=== Total Audio Promo Development Status ===' && echo 'Audio Intel Live: http://localhost:3000' && echo 'Playlist Pulse Live: http://localhost:3001' && echo 'Audio Intel Live (secondary): http://localhost:3002' && echo 'Audio Intel Live (tertiary): http://localhost:3003' && echo 'Backend Services: http://localhost:3004' && echo '============================================'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:build: find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.install:workspaces: npm run install:audio-intel && npm run install:playlist-pulse && npm run install:backend

author: Total Audio Promo
